readable.title: 3484841598_e26ee96aab
readable.content: A catcher in a black uniform on the ground with his glove upraised during a baseball game , while a man UN a white uniform keeps a foot on the base . Catcher on the ground , runner making base . The first baseman diving to catch a throw , while the runner touches first base in a softball game Two teams playing a softball game Women are playing softball and the catcher slides onto base .
